    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Block
    Represents a single block in a voxel world.
    Blocks
    Utility class for creating standard block meshes.
    Camera
    Represents a free-fly 3D camera controlled via keyboard and mouse input.
    Chunk
    Represents a chunk in the voxel world, composed of a 3D array of blocks.
    Entity
    Represents a 3D object in the scene with position, rotation, scale, and geometry.
    FileUtils
    Utility class for loading files from resources as strings.
    Input
    Handles user input via keyboard, mouse, and scroll wheel using GLFW.
    Main
    Main class for the 3D chunk generation visualizer.
    Material
    Represents a material that loads and manages a 2D texture from a file.
    Matrix4f
    A 4x4 matrix class used for 3D transformations, including translation, rotation, scaling, projection, and view.
    Mesh
    Represents a 3D mesh made up of vertices, indices, and a texture material.
    MeshBuilder
    Utility class for building meshes dynamically from block faces.
    Renderer
    Handles rendering of 3D entities using OpenGL and a provided shader.
    Shader
    Manages an OpenGL shader program composed of a vertex and fragment shader.
    Vector2f
    A simple 2D vector class with float precision.
    Vector3f
    A simple 3D vector class using float precision.
    Vertex
    Represents a single vertex in 3D space, containing both position and texture coordinate data.
    Window
    The Window class handles the creation, display, and management of a GLFW window.
